alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:56AM EDT until July 29 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Western Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 830 AM EDT. * At 756 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Olive, or over Beattyville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Beattyville around 800 AM EDT. Maloney around 805 AM EDT. St. Helens around 810 AM EDT. Tallega around 815 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Widecreek and Chenowee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
